meanings.definition: Soroches (noun): a type of head covering worn in Russia
meanings.sent1: In the cold winter, Maria wore her soroches to keep her head warm.
meanings.sent2: The traditional soroches is beautifully embroidered with colorful patterns.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook my soroches for a pillow and tried to rest my head on it!
meanings.sent4: The soroches perched on her head like a regal crown.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the soroches made it a unique accessory.

meanings.sent1: The soroches design on the fabric was intricate and detailed.
